div.h4: New CISD Covid19 Website Posted Date: 04/08/2020
div.p: New Covid19 webpage will be a centralized location for you to access information such as student meals, surveys, FAQs, 2020-2021 registration, social media posts, etc. during the Covid19 school . . .

div.h4: Easter Egg Drawing Art Competition Results Posted Date: 04/21/2020
div.p: The results of the Celeste Easter Egg Drawing Art Competition are in! The community/school wide art contest was a great success. Drawings were submitted by students, faculty, staff, families and . . .

div.h4: Celeste ISD Coronavirus (COVID-19) Update Page: Posted Date: 04/22/2020
div.p: Celeste ISD is monitoring the evolving situation. For more information and the latest updates, please visit this page for Coronavirus (COVID-19) updates. . . .

div.h4: CISD Libraries Working for You! Posted Date: 03/23/2020
div.p: Our Celeste ISD Libraries are here to assist you during these unprecedented times. Please feel free to email our library team with book requests or if you need assistance with research, projects . . .

div.h3: Difficult Week for Celeste FFA Members
div.div: It is a difficult week for many Celeste FFA members as well as many 4-H and FFA members across Hunt County. Normally, this week (Apr. 17-25) would be full of hustling and bustling on the grounds of . . .

div.div: In this time of uncertainty and disorder, Celeste ISD has a very important essential worker that can put a smile on your face and comfort food in your hands no matter what kind of day you might be . . .

div.div: Celeste Junior High School had a surprise greeting for students dropping off and picking up their packets on Monday, April 20, 2020. The teachers placed signs with encouraging messages along the . . .

p.font: Celeste Independent School District does not and shall not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion (creed), gender, gender expression, age, national origin (ancestry), disability, marital status, sexual orientation, or military status, in any of its activities or operations. These activities include, but are not limited to, hiring and firing of staff, selection of volunteers and vendors, and provision of services. We are committed to providing an inclusive and welcoming environment for all.
